mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.description AS "description", a.operate_time AS "operateTime", a.method AS "method", a.params AS "params", a.ip AS "ip", a.result AS "result", a.pre1 AS "pre1", a.pre2 AS "pre2", a.pre3 AS "pre3", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rui_user_log( id, user_id, description, operate_time, method, params, ip, result, pre1, pre2, pre3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{description}, #{operateTime}, #{method}, #{params}, #{ip}, #{result}, #{pre1}, #{pre2}, #{pre3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rui_user_log SET user_id = #{user.id}, description = #{description}, operate_time = #{operateTime}, method = #{method}, params = #{params}, ip = #{ip}, result = #{result}, pre1 = #{pre1}, pre2 = #{pre2}, pre3 = #{pre3} WHERE id = #{id}
